attributes.title: Very unclear directions
attributes.review:
Well first of all, I open the app to see Cheeto putting his fist up his rump, and as a 312 year old alien, I do NOT want to see this. Second of all, a recent study shows that Cheeto is SCARING young children and causing them to have nightmares, which is unacceptable. Third, the app directions were very unclear and they made me throw my cat out the window along with the 32 kids hidden in my basement and my grandma, of course, located in my air conditioning unit. Lastly, this app FORCED my mother to get married to a dolphin. Yes. This is a real thing. 
DO NOT TRUST THIS APP IT STEALS YOUR CAR!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: And it was Awkward for Evertbody
attributes.review: I came to see what all the fuss was about, but after downloading the app all I can say is I was not expecting for my phone to start screaming hateful and ignorant propaganda every time I turned it on. Iâ€™m having to delete this app as it has gotten me written up at work, my supervisor did not believe me when I said I was not the one that called her a dumb liberal snowflake, that it was just the ringtone that this app automatically downloaded on your phone. If I could give this app -1 Stars I would.
